message: I propose dividing the $10,000 into two parts, with you receiving $2,500 and I receiving $7,500. This offers a fair split considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a more equal split, considering the diminishing value of money. Your turn to decide!

Considering the diminishing value of money, I propose a more equal distribution. You would receive $4,000 and I would receive $6,000. This maintains a balance while accounting for the inflation in future rounds.
